details: Collect and display the statuses of key dependencies in one place.
whatsNew: Feat: add support for status io provider
Fix: Quick start dropdown now behaves properly
Feat: If no incident history is provided, let the user know and provide them a link directly to the status page of the service
Feat: Update the design for the toolbar
Feat: Adds a "mini timeline" to each service tile
Feat: Enables searching of tiles via search input in toolbar
